#Text=South African serial killer guilty of nineteen rapes , sixteen murders
#Text=Friday , March 18 , 2011
#Text=A judge in South Africa has convicted a serial killer of 52 crimes , including nineteen rapes , sixteen murders , an attempted murder and nine kidnappings .
#Text=Jack Mogale was convicted before Johannesburg High Court on Wednesday of being what police had dubbed the West End Serial Killer .
#Text=He was today sentenced to twenty concurrent life terms .
#Text=Mogale 's crimes lasted a year from March 2008 to March 2009 , coming to an end when police were passed his car 's number plate information following a teen 's disappearance .
#Text=He was arrested shortly after the killing of a prostitute he had hired ; he was found to have a phone stolen from another victim when he was detained .
#Text=Whilst the killer was still at-large police named him after the West-End factory , a building materials factory in Waterworks , Westonaria around which most of the attacks were centred .
#Text=Other victims were attacked in Lenasia .

#Text=Judge Frans Kgomo also chose to convict Mogale , who is in his forties , of three aggravated robberies , sexual assault , assault with intent to cause grievous bodily harm , theft or fraud and escaping lawful custody .
#Text=He cleared the defendant , who took victims to open areas before comitting sexual murders , of nine other charges .
#Text=41 witnesses testified for the prosecution , including the only two women to survive .
#Text=Both told the court he had introduced himself as a Zionist Christian preacher and prophet .
#Text=He wore a Christian Zion badge and sangoma beads , which both victims identified ; identity parades were also submitted as evidence .
#Text=The accused 's distinctive facial scar was recognised by the survivors .

#Text=The first described his help for a uterine ailment ; she said he claimed he needed to have sex with her to exorcise a spirit from her and placed herbs in her vagina , but Mogale countered that they had consensual intercourse as part of an affair .
#Text=The second said he took her to a veld and attacked her after giving her a lift , knocking her unconscious .
#Text=Upon awakening the following day she said she had maggot-infested wounds and a dislocated jaw .
#Text=Her genitals and neck were wounded ; her front teeth were missing .
#Text=When I come out of here you will be the first person I rape and kill — Mogale 's words to policewoman
#Text=Most of the bodies were badly decomposed when they were found .
#Text=They had mostly been killed by blunt force to the skull , either with a weapon or hitting their heads against the ground , although some were strangled .
#Text=Two women were sodomized .
#Text=DNA and mobile phone records linked him to the crimes .
#Text=He originally confessed to police .
#Text=" I want you to help me , " he told officers after his arrest .
#Text=" When I am with a woman I lose control and do not know what to do .

#Text=Judge Kgomo noted that  [ t]his defence is very suspicious , especially because the DNA kit was compiled long before the accused was even identified as a suspect and long before he was arrested , " and that the state witnesses were important to the case .

column1: #Text=" The accused was not a very good witness ... with his contradictions and new versions ... at times he wanted to shift blame onto his defence counsel . "
#Text=The judge felt " he was not telling the whole truth " and criticised his failure to produce witnesses to back up his claims .
#Text=Professor Gerard Labuschagne , who does investigative psychology for the police , was an important witness .
#Text=He told the court similarities between the various attacks meant they were " undoubtedly by the same offender . "
#Text=Some of the bodies remain unidentified .
#Text="

#Text=When he met the same policewoman at the station he said , ‘ when I come out of here you will be the first person I rape and kill ’ .

#Text=In summary , Kgomo said ,  [ t]he state has proved beyond reasonable doubt the accused ’s guilt . "

column1: #Text=" I did n't do anything , " protested Mogale shortly before judgement was handed down .
#Text=" You know how life is , this is a challenge , I did n’t do any of those things .

#Text=At sentencing today , Judge Kgomo called Mogale an  evil and perverted murderer and rapist who pose[s ] extreme danger to women in society . "

column1: #Text=As well as sixteen life terms for the murders , four extra life terms were handed down for raping some women twice .

#Text=Each of the three aggravated robberies attracted a fifteen-year sentence , each kidnap produced five years , three years for the theft and fraud charge , three for sexual assault , three for escaping custody and five for attempted murder .
#Text=All the sentences will run concurrently .
#Text=" Sir , there is no way you can be allowed to be out of prison to come into contact with women , " Kgomo told Mogale .
#Text=" I am removing you permanently from society . "
#Text=As Mogale was led away he shouted at the victims ' families " [ y]ou are also coming , I pray .
